job.title: Software Development Engineer - Automation (R3924)
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongAvalara Inc wwwAvalaracom is the leading provider of cloudbased software that delivers a broad array of compliance solutions related to sales tax and other transactional taxesbrbrWhat is it like to work at Avalara Come find out We are committed to the following success traits that embody our culture and how we work together to accomplish great things Fun Passion Adaptability Urgency Simplicity Curiosity Humility Ownership OptimismbrbrWe are building cloudbased tax compliance solutions to handle every transaction in the world Imagine every transaction you make  every tank of gas cup of coffee or pair of sneakers every movie ticket or streamed song every sensortosensor ping Nearly every time you make a purchase physical or digital there is an accompanying unique and nuanced tax compliance calculationbrbrstrongstrongWe are seeking a highly motivated experienced strongSoftware Development Engineer  Automationstrong to join our teambrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongAvaTech is looking for an experienced Software Development Engineer who has a primary focus on Automation and scalable processes in Corporate Information Technology The ideal candidate will have experience automating complex workflows and tasks across a variety of systems including integrations with Okta Active Directory ServiceNow and Workday Automation of Avlarians integrated systems and design through an employees lifecycle at Avalara will be the primary focus on this position You will apply design thinking and nextgen technologies to solve business challenges Youll work sidebyside with various architecture managers engineers and consultants to build innovative solutions to solve business challengesbrbrstronguKey ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliCollaborate with a diverse set of business customers and technology professionalsliliUse analytical and problemsolving skills to design efficient and robust automation logicliliAbility to help architect endtoend RPA solutionsliliParticipate in designing Automation scenarios and workflowsliliDesign code configure and test automation logicliliPrepare test scenarios and perform unit testsliliWork closely across all of Avalara to design integrated workflows and processesliliLeverage knowledge of continuous improvement methodsliliOperate within the agile delivery and continuous improvement methodologiesliliAbility to understand and utilize common APIsliliBuild Custom code for integrations throughout a wide range of modern technologiesliliSelfstarting with the ability to manage multiple automation initiatives in parallelliliThe applicant must have strong communication customer service troubleshooting and organizational skills and the ability to complete assigned workliliAbility to identify and apply best practices standards and SDLC concepts to all functional areasbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in computer science information technology or related fieldlili12 years of programmingsystems development experiencelili8 years of relevant experience with emphasis in process automation developmentlili5 years of experience working development participation amp support for UATOther testing phases and support release management to environmentsliliAdvanced knowledge of APIs Okta PowershellliliAutomation as a primary focus to scale out Avalara networksliliExcellent leadership and mentoring skillsliliHigh level problemsolving and communication skillsbrliulstronguAbout AvalarabrbrustrongAvalara helps businesses of all sizes achieve compliance with transactional taxes including VAT sales and use excise communications and other tax types We deliver comprehensive automated cloudbased solutions that are fast accurate and easy to usebrbrAvalara offers hundreds of prebuilt connectors into leading accounting ERP ecommerce and other business applications Each year the company processes billions of tax transactions for customers and users files hundreds of thousands of tax compliance documents and tax returns and manages millions of exemption certificates and other compliance related documentsbrbrAvalaras headquarters are in Seattle WA and it has offices across the US and in Brighton and London England Brussels Belgium and Pune India More information at wwwavalaracombrbrAvalara is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color creed religion age gender national orientation disability sexual
